dcterms:creator: Adina Williams
Nikita Nangia
Samuel R. Bowman
dcterms:description: MultiNLI consists of 393k pairs of sentences from a broad range of genres of written and spoken English, balanced across three labels. Each premise sentence is derived from one of ten sources of text, and each hypothesis sentence and pair label was composed by a crowd worker in response to a premise.
dcterms:title: Multi-Genre Natural Language Inference corpus (MultiNLI)

dcterms:creator: Samuel R. Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D. Manning
dcterms:description: SNLI is a large annotated corpus for learning natural language inference, consisting of sentence pairs labeled with entailment, contradiction, or neutral.
dcterms:title: Stanford NLI Corpus (SNLI)
